StringSet.String:
Thank you for your purchase of this Logitech product. Logitech products are designed to help you use your PC more effectively. Take advantage of enhanced product features by installing this software.
When you are ready to begin installation of this Logitech software product, please select your language and press the Next button.
Change the functions assigned to your Logitech mouse buttons or Logitech keyboard function keys
Change the functions assigned to your Logitech mouse buttons or Logitech keyboard function keys
Personalize the settings of your Logitech mouse or keyboard.
Click here to get Logitech Gaming Software to customize the settings of your gaming mouse.
Sorry, this software is not compatible with your operating system. Please visit www.logitech.com to download a compatible version.
This version of the installer requires a 32-bit edition of your operating system.\nPlease visit www.logitech.com/downloads/SetPoint to download a compatible version.
This version of the installer requires a 64-bit edition of your operating system.\nPlease visit www.logitech.com/downloads/SetPoint to download a compatible version.
